articles.title: How a pair of satellites are mimicking solar eclipses in space
articles.description: A pair of European satellites have created the first artificial solar eclipses through precise and fancy formation flying.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) — A pair of European satellites have created the first artificial solar eclipses by flying in precise and fancy formation, providing hours of on-demand totality for scientists.
The European Space Agency released the eclipse ... [3205 chars]

articles.title: New 2D superlattice extends zinc-ion battery lifespan
articles.description: Scientists from the National Graphene Institute at The University of Manchester and the University of Technology Sydney have developed a new way to improve the lifespan of zinc-ion batteries, offering a safer and more sustainable option for energy storage.

articles.title: DILG: Elected officials without SOCEs cannot assume office
articles.description: No elected official shall be allowed to take office unless he or she has complied with the submission of a statement of campaign expenses to the Commission on Elections, the Department of the Interior and Local Government said on Monday.
articles.content:
No elected official shall be allowed to take office unless he or she has complied with the submission of a statement of campaign expenses to the Commission on Elections, the Department of the Interior and Local Government said on Monday.

articles.title: Trump’s parade isn’t what he was hoping for. It was a disappointing, sad affair
articles.description: The uniformed soldiers marched irregularly, slightly off beat; the turnout was small and the crowd seemed defeated, low-energy and wilted
articles.content: In one version of the story, you can blame the French. Evidently it was in France, watching the 2017 Bastille Day military parade alongside Emmanuel Macron at the outset of his first term, that Trump initially got the idea to stage an armed spectacle... [5489 chars]

articles.title: New AI Method Can Find Tiny Traces of Cancer in Blood Samples
articles.description: A new AI method can detect even the tiniest traces of tumor DNA in blood samples, helping doctors to track if a cancer treatment is working.
articles.content: Researchers at the A*STAR Genome Institute of Singapore (A*STAR GIS) have developed a new way of tracking circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) in small blood samples using artificial intelligence (AI). The team reports that this new AI method, called “Fragl... [3407 chars]

articles.title: Is Microsoft Doing Away With Passwords?
articles.description: Microsoft recently alerted Microsoft Authenticator users that if they store passwords in that app, those passwords will be deleted by August of 2025.

articles.title: Iran and Israel crisis: what does it mean for the price of oil?
articles.description: Middle East conflict led to oil prices rising to $78 a barrel on Friday amid concerns it could cut flow of crude from region
articles.content:
The escalating crisis between Israel and Iran has already triggered the largest single-day oil price surge in the last three years, and the question for many is how much higher the oil markets might climb.
